sentences.en: Designer beers and trendy wines have replaced the good old British pint.
sentences.cn: 时尚的啤酒和流行的葡萄酒已经取代了老牌的英国啤酒。

sentences.en: Her bikini was one of those expensive designer jobbies.
sentences.cn: 她的比基尼泳装是那种价格昂贵的名牌产品。

sentences.en: His designer suits ruck up round his middle.
sentences.cn: 他的名牌套装在腰部起了褶皱。

sentences.en: I like to mix up designer clothes.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢把各种名牌服装混搭在一起。

sentences.en: People want to buy designer labels for snob value.
sentences.cn: 人们想买名牌是为了满足虚荣心。

sentences.en: Something must have created it - the design speaks a designer.
sentences.cn: 一定是某种力量创造了它,有安排就说明有安排者.

sentences.en: Staff will be issued with new grey-and-yellow designer uniforms.
sentences.cn: 将会向雇员发放灰黄相间的名牌新制服。

sentences.en: The book designer will have to redo the masterpieces layouts.
sentences.cn: 图书设计者将不得不重做这部名著的版面设计.

sentences.en: The book designer will have to redo the page layouts.
sentences.cn: 书籍设计者得重新编排版面.

sentences.en: The designer must consider this factor in the layout.
sentences.cn: 设计者在设计方案中必须考虑这一因素.

sentences.en: The Hatfield Puffin is a modern aeroplane, but its designer, Mr. John Wimpenny , is finding it difficult to get it off the ground.
sentences.cn: 哈特费尔德·普芬是一架时髦的飞机, 但设计这架飞机的人约翰·温佩尼先生感到很难使它飞离地面.

sentences.en: The playwright, the set designer, the wardrobe lady, all get credit.
sentences.cn: 剧作家, 布景设计者, 服装师, 大家都应得到荣誉.

sentences.en: Thus it came about that, after many years as an interior designer and antiques dealer, he combined both businesses.
sentences.cn: 这样，在从事多年的室内设计和古董经营后，他把二者结合了起来。

sentences.en: Tousled hair and designer stubble are chic.
sentences.cn: 乱蓬蓬的头发和时兴的胡茬都很新潮。

sentences.en: We are not extravagant; restaurant meals are a luxury and designer clothes are out.
sentences.cn: 我们并不铺张浪费：下馆子是一种奢侈，也不会考虑买名牌衣服。

words.tran_cn: 有计划的，原意的；故意的
指定；指派；标出；把…定名为
由设计师专门设计的；享有盛名的；赶时髦的

trans.tran_cn: 时尚的，标有设计师姓名的
trans.tran_en: made by a well-known and fashionable designer
someone whose job is to make plans or patterns for clothes, furniture, equipment etc
